author: Marty Johnson
title: China lifting restrictions in Hubei province
description: The Chinese government signaled on Tuesday that it would end its lockdown of Hubei province - home to the city of Wuhan, the initial epicenter of the coronavirus outbreak - at midnight, as the number of new cases in the c...
content:
The Chinese government signaled on Tuesday that it would end its lockdown of Hubei province home to the city of Wuhan, the initial epicenter of the coronavirus outbreak at midnight, as the number of new cases in the country has plummeted.
Provincial resident… [+816 chars]
